des:
With the skill TCL Assistant skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now interact with your TCL Smart TV by voice. It’s quick and easy to set up. Note: This skill only works with TCL Smart Android TVs. Please use the Roku skill for all TCL Roku TVs.
Simple Setup 
1. Click the “Enable” button on the top of the skill’s page to begin setup.
2. Activate your TCL Android TV by going to the TV Settings menu and selecting 'Settings -Apps -See all apps -Work with Alexa-Sign in or Obtain code'. The code will then appear on screen.
3. Insert the code into the Alexa app after enabling the skill.
4. Follow the on-screen instructions in the Alexa app to complete setup and enjoy!

Once you have linked your TV, you can say the following:

POWER 
"Alexa, turn off Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, turn on Bedroom TV."

CONTROL VOLUME
"Alexa, turn up the volume by 30 on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, turn down the volume by 20 percent on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, set volume to 20 on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, mute Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, unmute Bedroom TV."

SET INPUT SOURCE
"Alexa, change input to HDMI 1 on Bedroom TV."

CHANGE CHANNEL
"Alexa, change to channel 5.1 on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, change channel to BBC on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, skip to next channel on Bedroom TV.”
“Alexa, return to the previous channel on Bedroom TV.”

PLAYBACK CONTROL
"Alexa, pause on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, resume play on Bedroom TV."
“Alexa, play next on Bedroom TV.”
“Alexa, play previous on Bedroom TV.”
"Alexa, fast forward on Bedroom TV."
"Alexa, rewind on Bedroom TV."

**Only select models are supported.
**See if your TCL Android TV is supported in the menu'Settings -Apps -See all apps -work with Alexa-Sign in or Obtain code' (Not Compatible with Roku).
**You can validate your ‘TV name’ in the TV Settings menu.
